Reviews.Title: “Horrible Experience!!!”
Reviews.Author: ashfree
Reviews.Content: Horrible experience! I would have thought that staying at a Ramada it would at least have a restaurant, no! No restaurant available AT ALL, not even room service! The restaurant is closed and no food served in this hotel!! First night we got there, I found a tick in the bed, maintenance came to change the sheets and argued what kind of insect it was....an insect shouldn't be in the bed in the first place!!!!. The A/C would not get cold enough to keep us cool throughout the night! We only had the bed sheet on us (3 nights) and sweat the whole time due to poor A/C. Pillows felt like sleeping on a bag of cotton balls, no form at all, felt like a pillow case filled with little cotton balls! Lastly, the hotel room had 4 lamps, only 2 had actual light bulbs in them! We had to rearrange the bulbs to accommodate lighting conditions in the hotel room. We asked for more bulbs on the first night and never received them by the time we left 4 days/3 nights later! Would NOT recommend this place to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: ginny110411
Reviews.Content: As always, in the Daytona area and in need of a place to stay that had tractor-trailer parking and was also pet-friendly, we found this Ramada Inn to be a very nice surprise! Check in was great - the young woman at the desk was friendly, efficient and quick to get us a room. The price was comparable (don't know if the rates go up during racing events) and the pet fee was a little high at $25 but it turned out to be well worth it. I commend the cleaning staff on such a wonderful job of maintaining the rooms - we found ours to be a real treat! Neat, clean, spacious, odor-free, plenty of pillows and towels, and just generally a comfortable place to spend the night. The grounds and landscaping were meticulously kept, the pool area was neat and clean and offered plenty of space and seating and shaded areas, plenty of parking and just generally very impressive. The only drawback was a lack of any complimentary breakfast or even coffee for the morning. I was informed tho that each room did supply a coffee maker and the usual coffee "bags", sugar, creamer and tea bags. The retaurant area was still in the process of obtaining permits and is expected to be opening soon for this service. Yet, all in all, I highly recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the area. What a treat!

Reviews.Title: “Value for money”
Reviews.Author: Travel_Wizard007
Reviews.Content: The hotel is conveniently located near the airport and near the circuit. If you want to stay in Daytona beach near the colleges - Embry Riddle or Daytona state college, this hotel fits perfectly. All the equipments worked well and the room was clean. The towels, linens etc were clean and the staff in the front desk were really friendly. The only downside is the building looked a bit old and there was minimal interior decor. But the hotel is definitely good value for money. I would strongly recommend it to any new college students who are looking for a few days to stay before finalizing the accommodation.

Reviews.Title: “Really nice visit”
Reviews.Author: lisach5161
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Ramada this past weekend. We were very happy with the rooms. Very clean. Good air conditioning. Very comfortable beds. The swimming pool was lots of fun. We had it all to ourselves. There is no breakfast at the hotel. But the price was so reasonable that you can eat out. We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Safety does not exist at ramada”
Reviews.Author: Atari749
Reviews.Content: The hotel has no regards to safety. My mother and I stayed at this place for 2 weeks. In the middle of the night we got a call from the hotel phone with a weirdo saying really rude and inappropriate things. We reported it to rob who was the receptionist. He didn't seem to care too much for our safety as we asked to switched rooms but seemed more concerned about dirtying another room. There is no security guards or anything that would leave one to feel safe.I would never recommend the hotel to anyone . There is also no management ever on property. The pool is filthy with used bandages and debris at the bottom.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT!”
Reviews.Author: David T
Reviews.Content: Booked thru Florida Beach Destinations. I was skeptical after reading some of the reviews but decided to check it out. What a surprise to be greeted by very friendly peoples at the front desk. Our room was very clean. This was just a week after the Coke 400 race. Had a small problem with the air conditioner but they repaired it quickly. The bed was almost as comfortable as ours at home which is something most people would not say about hotel beds. We will stay at this Inn every time we travel to Daytona Beach from here on. Thanks Ramada Inn Speedway!!

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: TonyT
Reviews.Content: Great location. Right by Volusia Mall and across the street from DIS. Bid for a hotel through Priceline so price was great as well! Definitely would stay again for the right price as my room was clean and everything worked properly.

Reviews.Title: “Not your typical Ramada”
Reviews.Author: robertashouse
Reviews.Content: Booked thru Hotwire stayed Friday June 15, 2012 for $41.00. I have to admit I was skeptical when I got 2 1/2* and it was Ramada. My past Ramadas stays were less than acceptable It was located across the street from Daytona Speedway Racetrack. This is a family owned and operated hotel and I was warmly greeted by Megan and Marilyn who allowed me to check in a couple of hours early which was greatly appreciated. I always ask any hotel I stay at if they are expecting a school group or sports group and as luck would have it they were. My heart sank immediately. I requested a quiet room away from the students and was given room 244 along the backside (parking lot side very well lit) across from Homewood Suites. The Student group were placed poolside a good distance away. . They have security/maintenance man who addresses any noise issues which I am delighted to say there WERE NO ISSUES! Carpet had been replaced, lighting was very good in room, nice desk and office chair. newer mattresses , clean bathroom and asst. toiletries.. Very large older tv which worked fine ,free internet in the rooms. Lighting in the parking lot and stairways was excellent. Crest toothpaste and GArnier Fruitise shampoo samples in lobby. The only negative was the worn out pillows. I was given at check in $5.00 off $15.00 coupon for the Restaurant on site which was Chicago Uno. There are numerous chain restaurants within 1 mile radius, and it is located next to a large mall which is within walking distance., The owners really care about the guests and go above and beyond to make the guests happy. They even called to see if everything was ok in the room and if they could do anything else. WOW was I impressed!!! I did not use the pool as it was raining off and on, but it looked clean. I would definetly stay at this hotel again, especially since I used the $20.00 rebate coupon (F-26) listed in Entertainment book for even more savings. I suggest requesting room 244 for a nice stay.

Reviews.Title: “AVOID!”
Reviews.Author: JohnAkron
Reviews.Content: Spent one night here and was sorry I did. Paid $40 through Hotwire and trust me that was way too high for this place. Check in took 40 minutes of standing at the front desk while 3 people who got some kind of deal through Groupon asked a million stupid questions (this wasn't the hotels fault but a sign of things to come). After we finally got to the room we were less than impressed. Dirty, holes in the sheets, mold, gross-gross-gross place.

Reviews.Title: “A good choice w/o disappointments”
Reviews.Author: Gil L
Reviews.Content: This is an older hotel that has been well maintained and is well cared for. Gloria (front desk) is an asset to the establishment and a welcoming voice to the traveler. The restaurant is clean. It is decorated with a lot of interesting historic photos, not all of which (thankfully) were racing related. This was a business trip on somebody else's dime so "frugal" was in operation. Two nights for $85 (Groupon) pleased the government client. The full breakfast that was included was well worth the published price and portions were ample. There is no need to spend more when you can find quality like this at this price. A night in a hotel is not an event that impresses the hotel. I will remember a clean, functional hotel far longer than I can use the hotel's name to impress my colleagues.

Reviews.Title: “good place!”
Reviews.Author: Bobbyaisss
Reviews.Content: I stayed there with my bf on valentine's day, since I have class that night, however, It was a nice experience and the room was clean, bed feels so solid--which means good!!! it's not like cheap quality bed, but very comfortable and solid. I didnt even feel he got up during the night...lol... the only thing that may not be that good is it's next to the intl speedway--so the traffic noise is a problem.

Reviews.Title: “Just okay...can do better.”
Reviews.Author: mrscoperx
Reviews.Content: Let me first preface my review saying that I received a great deal on Groupon for this hotel. We travel to the area often, and for the price we paid, we got what it was worth. That being said, my husband and I will probably not return to this location. Pros: Location is great, right across from the racetrack and next to the mall and shopping; room was relatively quiet and a fair size; towels for showering were okay; pool area was excellent; front desk help (middle age gentleman) was wonderful upon check in. Cons: Water pressure is minimal and the temperature fluctuation is CONSTANT (we spent the entire shower trying to “get it right”, so to speak. It seems to depend on the water usage of your neighbors at the time); television is almost impossible to watch as it is very old and grainy; toilet would continue running if you didn’t jiggle the handle; and we don’t believe that our housekeeper vacuumed our room prior to arrival as we found a very large wad of long black hair where someone apparently cleaned off their brush right in front of the sink area where we were standing barefooted. Our carpet needed cleaning. At regular price on a non-event weekend, you can get a room at this hotel for around $67 or so. I say, save your money, and put another $20 with it and get a nicer room down the road for just a little more jingle. It’s too bad because it certainly has some potential. Fixing the plumbing, put in new tvs, and make sure the rooms are vacuumed would make a huge difference!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay in Daytona Beach by the Volusia Mall”
Reviews.Author: wolven1959
Reviews.Content: We stayed during our trip in May. Was not crowded, very clean , nice pool area. By the main road but still got a good nights sleep. They had a pizza/restaurant Lounge attached but we ended up going to neighboring Applebys at the Volusia Mall so we did not get to check it out. They did have room service available, and WIFI Internet. In the lobby there is a ATM and printing capabilities if you need to print boarding passes, etc. There is also a Gas Station on the property. Very convenient! Price was very reasonable (I do not know what it is during events like Bikeweek or Motorweek but what we paid I was pleasantly surprised. And if you do your booking online they have xtra discounts to your amount especially if you are booking for more than 3 or 4 days. All in all it was a great place to stay, I definitely will stay again the next time I am in Daytona!

Reviews.Title: “Really should listen..”
Reviews.Author: diande_76
Reviews.Content: If the experience using your Groupon ever lets you down, we’ll make it right or return your purchase. Simple as that NASTY NASTY NASTY! This is just gross. cigarette burns on a blanket, threadbare sheets that are so worn they aren't sheets, unknown stains and hairs on the bed, ants and goodness knows what else.I did not come here for a disease or bedbugs! GROSS and it has Ramada's name ??! I tried to notify management to no avail! Internet doens't work. Read the sketchy reviews on Tripadvisor but we thought it can't be that bad and it's not, it's worse! I have a kid and no telling what she will end up with! Tub didn't drain and had to have someone plunge it! Rude front desk people! Just nasty!! Pool is also gross and full of bugs! Oh and the leftover clothes in a drawer..You can tell they don't clean. I wouldn't care about the outdated, but the dirtiness??? YUCK! IF we had the money we would go across the street! GROSS!! Just don't stay here. I am not sure what room the others had, but it wasn't this one.

Reviews.Title: “My first stay at the Ramada”
Reviews.Author: CeeMass
Reviews.Content: I was pleased with my first stay at the Ramada Speedway, Daytona Beach. It is very close to everywhere we wanted to visit. The rooms are nice for the price, the staff is very friendly and helpful. The adjoining restaurant Unos was great! We were walking distance to the Volusia Mall, right next door! I could not get wifi which was a big problem for me, and the only other downfall was that the pool had a large amount of dead bugs floating in it, and I could not enjoy it, my daughters asked the maintenance if he could get the net to get them out, and he said he would but he never returned. All in all it was a nice stay and I will definitely return.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, close, convenient to Daytona...”
Reviews.Author: DCA874
Reviews.Content: For a quick get-away weekend that is clean. close and convenient to all the pleasures of Daytona Beach, you can't beat the Ramada Speedway Daytona. The Volusia Mall is within walking distance. Uno Restaurant is connected to the Ramada for your morning breakfast and all other yummy meals. The pool is clean and spacious. Across the street is the Daytona International Speedway and just a few miles away is the beach and the ocean. Everything you want or need is available from this motel. And the beds are comfy. A coffee service is in each room along with a hair dryer, iron, and wifi. This is theeeee place I pick every time I want a few days of R and R.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Great Service - convenient location, of course!”
Reviews.Author: busydeb7
Reviews.Content: Great rate for the season of Feb 2012, $67 bux! Our room was OK, and the blankets need to be of a better quality, too thin. Carpets need cleaning, yuk. But the price was nice, and across from the DAYTONA SPEEDWAY...woohoo. Uno restaurant is right next door and has great service as well as great food too.

Reviews.Title: “Thank you for a great stay.”
Reviews.Author: dm68model
Reviews.Content: I had a fantastic stay, thank you for the great service. Your staff was great with directions . I will be returning when I'm in the Daytona area.

Reviews.Title: “over 30 nights in 4 years!!”
Reviews.Author: AngryBirdMSP
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here over 30 nights in 4 years. Good hotel for the value, very very close to mall, decient food, uno's is great. close to airport. Good staff. Need Guest Laundry PLEASE!!!!!!! Perfect place to layover in daytona Beach. Internet is not the best sometimes

Reviews.Title: “Beat up old "motel". Stay elsewhere”
Reviews.Author: sidelinesports
Reviews.Content: Old rooms. Beat up, dingy, etc. Only two benefits: One, it's directly across the street from the Daytona Speedway and Two, there's an Uno's Pizza attached. Stay elsewhere unless it's cheap. Mike S

Reviews.Title: “Good stay at the Ramada!”
Reviews.Author: Jeff N
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel for a family event in Daytona. The room was clean. the area was safe. The hotel is directly across the street to the Daytona International Speedway. I would stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Fun Stay, close to the track.”
Reviews.Author: hoytselena
Reviews.Content: We had a good stay. We had a couple issues with our room but the front desk hooked us up.. Close to the track !!! The bar needs to be staffed a little better on race week-end but other wise okay.

Reviews.Title: “Ideally located for the racetrack”
Reviews.Author: Pligs
Reviews.Content: Probably the oldest of the hotels round the Speedway thus getting a bit worn. Nevertheless very helpful and accommodating staff.

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel Stay”
Reviews.Author: amygt1104
Reviews.Content: On our way to Miami we stopped off at this hotel. I was very satisfied. It is an older hotel but I liked the nostalgia of it. The rooms had been remodeled and there was free internet/wifi connection in room. Big plus. Got a great deal on Priceline and me and my hubby were very happy with this stop over on way through Florida.

Reviews.Title: “Not So Fast”
Reviews.Author: fixitso
Reviews.Content: We stayed here because it was so close to the track and the Daytona 500, The room was small and the bed could have been better, the plumbing needed repair. I was disappointed being that it was a Ramada Inn and will say it was probally the worst I ever stayed in. We were charged for movies we never saw and I am still trying to get a refund. I would not rrecommend.

Reviews.Title: “Good enough for what I needed”
Reviews.Author: MNLowroller
Reviews.Content: We traveled to Daytona Beach for Bike week, I'll try to give as much applicable info as I can. We booked the room through a website that doesn't reveal the hotel name until after you book so we were taking our chances. We were checking in late, I called ahead to let them know, no problem. Location: Right across the street from the Daytona speedway, it was about 5 miles from main street / the beach, with traffic that takes about 15-20 minutes. A short drive to The Cabbage Patch, Destination Daytona, The Ormond Strip. Nothing was more than a few minutes away. The room: clean room, 2 double beds, standard tv with basic cable, the bathroom was a little ratty, but not too bad. Facilities: The pool looked nice, but the weather was too cold to use it. The grounds were well cared for, parking lot was well lit and in descent shape and plenty of room for trailer parking. They also had a bike wash area set up. There's also a gas station right next door. There is an UNO pizzeria on site, they serve breakfast and can deliver room service, we saved a few bucks by ordering takeout and picking it up ourselves. They also had WiFi which worked alright, but my phone didn't like the authorization screen setup. Overall: It did exactly what we needed,it was a good place to sleep that didn't gross me out.

Reviews.Title: “The Complete Package”
Reviews.Author: djjayjamz
Reviews.Content: Daytona Beach is the World's most famous beach. I feel the Ramada helped fulfill that statement. Right acrooss the street from the World's most famous speedway too. Location to everything we wanted to do was a major selling point. We like to go out and about and were able to do that with ease. Returning to our room was awesome every time. The place is run like a well oiled machine. Staff is awesome complete with efficient roomservice at all hours. The only negative experience that I can say that I experienced was the fact that I wasn't able to stay longer. So a message to the staff that I would send is simple... YOU ROCK!

Reviews.Title: “Great service and location”
Reviews.Author: KristiBarber
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Ramada Speedway for the Coke Zero 400 in Daytona Beach and could not have been happier with our selection. Wonderful staff, clean rooms and great pool. Will definitly stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: nettemark
Reviews.Content: We stayed here on our way to Miami for a cruise. Everything was just as stated on their web site and other places I looked at this place. It was clean, within walking distance to the mall, and very comfortable. We wanted to stay on the return trip home but it was all booked up for the next weekend. Would surely stay at this place again!!!

Reviews.Title: “nice people at the desk of Ramada”
Reviews.Author: parr0tgirl
Reviews.Content: We have stayed there three times, once in 2003 and twice in 2004. The people at the front desk could not be nicer. They have been the same each time we have been there. The rooms are fine. They are clean and the restaurant there, Chicago, is really good. Try the pizza. The appetizers are half price in the afternoon during happy hour. They do have great happy hour drink prices too.

Reviews.Title: “save $$ but no sleep”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Cheaper than the Hilton Garden Inn, but no service or service.

HotelInfo.Name: Ramada Speedway Daytona
HotelInfo.Address: 1798 W International Speedway Blvd., Daytona Beach, FL 32114
